Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 27th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2021...
Injured on 8/2/2021 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Oakland on 2/3/2022 (Going to PIT: LF Anthony Santander. Going to OAK: P Enrique Frau, LF Ross Kivett, 3B William Shank)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2023, off Noah Syndergaard (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2023, off Joseph Ortiz (TEX)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Toronto on 9/5/2024...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2024, hitting .625 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Texas on 6/24/2025...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
